name: Virgin Brazilian Natural Wave
description:
Long, luxurious, wavy tresses, that can be straightened and return to original curly state when wet. Excellent texture gradient optimal for most natural and relaxed hair textures. This Virgin Brazilian Hair  is ideal for color processing and guaranteed to produce quality pigmentation. With proper maintenance and installation method hair can last for over 6 months.

*Virgin Brazilian Hair
*Natural Brown Color
*Wavy
*3.5 oz

For custom length inquires email lavishglamour@me.com
